Reviews.Title: Amazing Computer!!
Reviews.Author: Yasmin Dudley
Reviews.Content: Where do I start, I have been researching laptops for the last 6 months, looking at specs etc. I needed to replace my laptop that has become outdated. I bought a Dell 5 years ago that was just too slow to watch videos, download anything or keep up with all of the new software upgrades. I wanted a laptop with speed, good memory, decent video graphics, large enough hard drive so that I wouldn't be changing it soon. Plus I wanted an expandable computer in terms of memory so that I wouldn't be limited at a really good price.It is a 15.6 inch, 2.3G processing speed and 4G memory, with 320 Hard drive it is fast, you can view most of the HD videos clearly they finally load for me on You Tube..lol I need one also for work at home, since I use it for a lot of number entries. This is one of the best if not the best keyboards w/10 key numeric pad. I have large fingers and it is comfortable and easy to use it is set up just like an adding machine for accountants, or bookkeepers. There is just enough texture and grip of the keys for fast and easy typing. Another thing I loved about it was the gray interior it shows less visible fingerprints and dust for those who don't like the glossy black of most Toshiba's out there.It was easy to set up I was so worried about how long it would take. I had already had a wireless network so all I did was boot up created a password and sign on, the connected to my wireless network and I was on the net. Yes to some it might have too much bloatware(unnecessary programs) but for those who are not as computer savvy it includes all the files to get you up and running but you need to update them from time to time. The camera is so easy to use and Skype is already set up.When I bought it was a much better deal it is bright and easy to use for night viewing, especially if you watch movies or download movies online. I have just had it for a month but as long as you have a good registry cleaner program to clean up Windows 7 it should continue to run fast. One downer is I wish Toshiba would come with the Operating System disks included it is irritating to have to copy them on your own.Overall you cannot get most of the specs like a large comfortable full size keyboard, with a 15.6 inch TruBrite screen, webcam 1.3 pixel, 320G Hard drive, ATI graphics, labelfish for your CD/DVD, 2.3G AMD processor with 4G memory for this price you cannot compare. Plus it is lightweight easy to move from room to room. So far very happy with my purchase.

Reviews.Title: What's Wrong With this Laptop?
Reviews.Author: John Guzlowski
Reviews.Content: If you read the 4 and 5 star reviews you'll get a sense of what works on this computer.But they may not mention that two things are in fact annoying.1.  The sound quality on the speakers is awful.  If you want to hear music or watch a movie, you'll have to have speakers.2.  The battery life is way short.  Usually about an hour and thirty minutes.  Keep your plug handy.

Reviews.Title: Love my Toshiba
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: I had been looking for a new laptop for quite some time when I came across the reviews on Amazon about this model. I had been advised by a computer-whiz son of mine to look for a Toshiba this time around, since in his opinion (he's a computer engineer) they are well-made and predominantly trouble-free. So when I found this computer, and read the reviews on its performance, I was sold. Now that I've used it for a couple of weeks, I have to agree. It's a sweet computer for the price. The keyboard is great, and since I do a lot of typing, I like how it feels. The Web-cam feature works great. And I love Windows 7 so far. The battery lasts about 2-3 hours, which is typical for a laptop. The screen resolution is great. Toshiba Satellite L505-ES5015 TruBrite 15.6-Inch Laptop (Silver/Black)

Reviews.Title: I love it BUT
Reviews.Author: Ms. Electrionics "Yasha"
Reviews.Content: First and foremost I love this laptop! It is great for the things I do every day. I use it to complete assignments and to surf the internet. I have found that though this laptop has HD sound (yes it's awesome) the system speakers do it no justice, they are low and not great quality. I plugged in my earbuds and was blown away!!! I haven't tried it with external speakers yet but I will soon. My second issue is the two USB ports. To remedy that I brought a usb hub. Overall I am loving my Toshiba Satellite L505-E5025. If you are looking for a great inexpensive system, I highly recommend this one. I have the AMD processor and it's working great for me. Consider buying antivirus software and MS office when buying this product because it only comes with trial version of Norton and MS Office 07.

Reviews.Title: Solid laptop & great value
Reviews.Author: Jim
Reviews.Content: The L505 was a good choice for me. In the middle of a large dissertation, I had to dump my old beloved 2004 Gateway to keep up with Microsoft's constant system upgrade demands. The Toshiba is a bit heavy for a laptop but it has a solid feel for my mostly desktop use. Mousepad functionality is spotty but I rely mainly on a mouse.  It is fast and (thus far) my McAfee installs happen quickly and quietly in the background without my even noticing. My only complaint is the squat dimensions of screen.  The 15.6" "Tru-bright" screen is nice and bright, but the screen ratio makes it wide and short. If you are a document writer (vice an Excel jockey or primarily an internet surfer) you are giving up a lot of good screen space for documents. The wide dimensions make for other annoyances ... the power plug and USB port (only 2) with a thumb drive inserted on the right side require that you keep your mouse-arm splayed wide-right. Why not put these ports in the back?  Otherwise, for my $540, this is a great machine.  I looked at Dells in the same price range and they seem cheap and plasticky in comparison.  Unfortunately, we are getting to the age of disposable laptops, in which it is easier to buy a new one than to upgrade. Perhaps cheap and plasticky, low and squaty, are the wave of future.

Reviews.Title: exactly what I want  //  justo lo que queria
Reviews.Author: Rodolfo Alvarez
Reviews.Content: Esta laptop me ha venido a solucionar muchas necesidades de la universidad - que fue para lo que la compre. Un precio excelente para una laptop con tantas caracteristicas que otros modelos desearin: USD $ 575.00. Si no te importa un sonido impresionante en los parlantes (pero aun asi bueno), o estar conectado porque la bateria solo dura 2 1/2 hrs, entonces esta puede ser una excelente opcion para alguien que quiere algo bueno, rapido, funcional y con tecnologia de puntaThis laptop has solved out many of my main needs in college - which is why I got it. A great price for such laptop with good performance features you would pay more in other models: USD $ 575.00. If you don't mind about good speakers (good sound though), or being plugged-in because the battery only lasts 2 1/2 hrs, then this could be an excellent choice for someone looking for something good, fast working, functional and high-tech features

Reviews.Title: So far, so good
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer "natvteksun"
Reviews.Content: Chose this model because it got a good rating from Consumer Reports. My first Toshiba. So far, seems like great quality for the price. Easy set-up. Speakers are so-so, but then I didn't buy it for that feature. Screen is bright and beautiful. Love the extended keyboard. High hopes for a good relationship with my new laptop.

Reviews.Title: Awesome Toshiba Products
Reviews.Author: Lil_Kitten7
Reviews.Content: Just would like to say the new Toshiba Satellite L505-ES5015 with Windows7 is just awesome ! I wsn't sure I would like a Wide Screen, but I love it and would never go back to a regular size screen. As far as how it works, it's fast, has a great size keyboard and easier than I thought it would be to set up the way you want it. Love the built-in Web Cam. You can also see everything that is downloaded on your computer from the Start Menu !  I just love it and would buy another one if I ever needed it and would recomend it to everyone. IT comes jammed paced with a lot of extras already downloaded for you.

Reviews.Title: Toshiba Laptop review
Reviews.Author: Herb Bryan
Reviews.Content: My second Toshiba laptop. The last one worked for almost 8 years before the hard drive failed.This new laptop feels sturdy, is lightning fast compared to the old one, as you can imagine (4 GB vs. 512 MB RAM), definitely a lot of computer for the price. Better than promised, the laptop was delivered in a very short time with no problems.

Reviews.Title: Poor sound!
Reviews.Author: Skewer
Reviews.Content: I have been using my Toshiba L505 for over 6 months now.  I did a lot of research prior to purchasing.  For the most part I love it.  However ... I had read warnings about the poor sound quality of the speakers and just wrote it off as coming from someone with unrealistic expectations or someone not used to using a laptop.  WRONG.  These are by far and away the worst speakers on the planet.  I don't see how Toshiba could put these pieces of junk in an otherwise nice laptop.  If I want to listen to ANYTHING I have to drag out the ear buds.  For that reason, and that reason alone, I don't recommend purchase of this model.  My old Toshiba had decent speakers so if you are considering this model .... do yourself a big favor and keep looking.

Reviews.Title: great
Reviews.Author: DENNON
Reviews.Content: i've had this laptop since april 2010 let me say this is absolutely a great computer there is nothing bad i can say about this .....money well spent

Reviews.Title: Toshiba Satellite L5052-ES5025
Reviews.Author: Velvet
Reviews.Content: It is a good laptop. This is my first laptop so I really don't have much to compare it to. I have not had any problems except the sound on it is very low and the battery life won't last 2 hours but that wasn't a issue for me, I would just plug it up to the charger. If you are a person that would like to travel with their laptop and use it all over, this one is not for you unless you don't mind using your charger every where you go. The key board is great, the clarity of the screen wonderful. The price was even better.

Reviews.Title: Tosiba laptop
Reviews.Author: P. M. Hancock
Reviews.Content: Thgis item was shipped from Amereica, (Altthough had to pqay import on it in U.K.) it was stillm a good deal, great machine, bur keyboard 's slightly different, & you have to work out which key does what for things @ & £, but otherwise good purchase,  One donwside it s6tates in the booklet that it shoul;d come with appropriate plug for country or use, but it only came with  the American version,, had to fiddle about with some old stuff I had & managed to find 1 that fitted, overhaul for performance & quality I wld give it 8.1/2 out of 10

Reviews.Title: poor sound
Reviews.Author: SSM "hooloo82"
Reviews.Content: While I received the item much quicker than I had expected, I would not purchase the item again.  The sound quality is awful. Even when turned up all the way, you can hardly hear anything.

Reviews.Title: Thrilled!!
Reviews.Author: Sharon Timmons "Sherry the Shopper"
Reviews.Content: This laptop is just what I needed. It has all of the features that I wanted and it works great. I wish that the battery charge lasted longer, but it does charge really fast. The extra numeric keypad is a plus for when you are just working with numbers.Great laptop.

Reviews.Title: excellent, fast, functional, affordable laptop
Reviews.Author: T. Redick
Reviews.Content: I bought this laptop to replace my Toshiba Tecra.  My Tecra was slow, crashed frequently, and became almost unusable when paired with my kaspersky Internet Security.  Because of my experiences with that computer I was hesitant to try another Toshiba but was convinved by both the specs and the affordability of this model.  I must say I was completely, pleasantly surprised by how great the Satellite is!  This computer is lightening fast.  I am actually finding myself annoyed by the slowness of my desktop computer now, which is an extremely expensive computer.  It downloads my audio files in record time and uploads my mp4 files to youtube in less than half the time I have been accuostomed to.  I am a transcriptionist and find the keyboard to be very comfortable and efficient for long periods of typing.  The screen is very clear and crisp.  HD appears great on it.  Probably one of my favorite things about it is the Windows 7.  I, like most people, have been extremely dissapointed in Windows Vista and had really high hopes that 7 would be an improvement.  Windows 7 has exceeded my expectations in every way!  I quite often have many windows open at one time and switch back and forth to research the topics I'm writing about and review instructions that have been sent to me via email.  The Windows 7 allows you to view in small or full size every Window you have open without actually navigating away from the Window you're currently working on.  This has been extremely helpful to me.  Everything about Windows 7 has been functional and intuitive and has helped to make me even more productive.  I cannot say enough good things about Windows 7 or the Toshiba Satellite.  I highly recommend it to anyone looking for a fast, affordable, functional laptop.(The reviewer was compensated for posting this review.  However, the opinion stated in the review is that of the reviewer and the reviewer alone. Further, the reviewer independently selected this product to review and has no affiliation with the product maker/distributor, Amazon or the review requester)

Reviews.Title: Great Laptop
Reviews.Author: Duane A. Lueders "Luedd66"
Reviews.Content: Bought this for my sister in law who isn't very computer literate and she just loves it. Can't comment much on this item but, I have a Toshiba 17" and have had no problems in the six months I have owned it. Even upgraded it from Vista to Win7 with no problems.

Reviews.Title: Update: Toshiba has offered an update so you can run Virtual PC
Reviews.Author: Mysterious Reviewer
Reviews.Content: THE FOLLOWING REVIEW IS FOR THE INTEL MODEL NOT THE AMD MODEL OF THIS COMPUTER:UPDATE MARCH 25: TOSHIBA HAS OFFERED AN UPDATE WHICH WILL ALLOW VIRTUAL PC TO RUN ON THIS COMPUTER. IT'S TOO LATE FOR ME AS I GAVE THIS COMPUTER TO MY DAUGHTER AND PURCHASED A USED LENOVO COMPUTER LAPTOP FROM AMAZON.We bought this laptop so I could run my beloved Mastercook program to help me do grocery shopping. I also use this computer to run my Wild Ginger sewing pattern software.I do like how easy it is to find files and other programs using Windows 7. As much as I loved Windows XP, the search function and ease of locating files, is so much better on Windows 7.The mouse pad on this computer is a bit fast. I did manage to configure it to the slowest speed possible but it's still mighty fast.The computer is light in weight, uses the battery efficiently, the display is easy to read, and the computer seems to run cooler than my old HP laptop.Recommend.

Reviews.Title: First Laptop
Reviews.Author: G. Guesby
Reviews.Content: I love it! It's shiny, it's functional and I'm learning about a whole new world in taking my computer with me wherever I go! Thanks, Toshiba!

Reviews.Title: Faulty item
Reviews.Author: Olga Lucia Serna "Olmut"
Reviews.Content: I am very disappointed with this computer. I have owned a lot of laptops, including a couple of Toshiba's, but this one is the only computer that has crashed when booted for the first time. I took it for repair. They first thought the problem was on the software, but finally, after a month of noise and crashes, they decided to change the hard disk. It is really annoying.

Reviews.Title: amazing computer
Reviews.Author: Mark C
Reviews.Content: Simply put, this is the best laptop I've ever owned at a remarkable price. Extremely good specs, screen is large and has good graphics for watching vids, and it has a full-sized keyboard complete with numeric keypad on the side that is extremely helpful if you do a lot of spreadsheet functions. I agree with other posters that the speakers are pretty low volume and sound "tinny" but this isn't that much of a problem for me since I can just plug in headphones or my Logitech S220 2.1 speakers (another extremely great product) and it sounds great. Overall, I am extremely pleased with this laptop and highly recommend it.

Reviews.Title: No Refund
Reviews.Author: Michael H. Shimanek
Reviews.Content: No refund, returned almost immediately because the PC had limited capability, no HDMI, cursor would continually jump to where ever it wanted. It was defective and now they will not refund our money. We have bought a HP at Walmart that works.There is still no refund a few weeks later, nor any communication from Amazon or the seller. 5/26/10 is almost a month after it was returned and confirmed by UPS.
